walletConnect.title: Algorand WalletConnect
walletConnect.description: Use WalletConnect to link your Algorand wallet to AlgoMart.
walletConnect.helpText: Need a wallet? Get one here:
walletConnect.orCancel: or cancel and disconnect from wallet

cannotTransfer.frozen: This NFT is frozen and cannot be transferred.

exportStatus.optingIn: Please confirm the transaction in your wallet to opt-in to the NFT.
exportStatus.signTransaction: Please sign the transaction in your wallet to transfer the NFT.
